content.prompt_es: Selecciona la traducción para 'Cinturón de seguridad':

content.stimulus_en: You (must) ________ stop at the red light.
Do you ________ (have to) go?
She (must) ________ be on time.
He (have to) ________ get up early.
I (have to) ________ wear a uniform at work.
We (not/have to) ________ pay now.
I have to finish this report by Friday.
All must passengers wear their seatbelts.
He has to travel a lot for his job.
Do have you to bring your own lunch?
We don't have to work on weekends.
You wear must a helmet when you ride a motorcycle.
The modal or word for Regla is '________'.
Law
The modal or word for Necesario is '________'.
Uniform
The modal or word for Licencia is '________'.
Passport
